meanings.definition: In a generous or kind manner.
meanings.sent1: She donated charitably to the local charity every month.
meanings.sent2: The neighbors always spoke charitably about each other.
meanings.sent3: The cat charitably shared its toy with the dog.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone charitably on the blooming flowers.
meanings.sent5: The teacher smiled charitably at the struggling student.

meanings.definition: With goodwill or compassion towards others.
meanings.sent1: He always listened charitably to his friend's problems.
meanings.sent2: The nurse treated the patients charitably and with care.
meanings.sent3: The child charitably offered their last cookie to their sibling.
meanings.sent4: The music charitably soothed the anxious crowd.
meanings.sent5: The volunteer worked charitably at the homeless shelter every weekend.
